哪.definition: which? (interrogative, followed by classifier or numeral-classifier)

哪兒.definition: where?; wherever; anywhere; somewhere; (used in rhetorical questions) how can ...?; how could ...?

哪兒的話.definition: (coll.) not at all (humble expression denying compliment); don't mention it

哪兒跟哪兒.definition: what's that have to do with it?; what's the connection?

哪壺不開提哪壺.pinyin: na3 hu2 bu4 kai1 ti2 na3 hu2
哪壺不開提哪壺.definition: lit. mention the pot that doesn't boil (idiom); to touch a sore spot; to talk about sb's weak point

哪怕.definition: even; even if; even though; no matter how

哪裏.definition: where?; somewhere; anywhere; wherever; nowhere (negative answer to question); humble expression denying compliment; also written 哪裡|哪里

哪裡.definition: where?; somewhere; anywhere; wherever; nowhere (negative answer to question); humble expression denying compliment

哪裡哪裡.definition: you're too kind; you flatter me

哪門子.definition: (coll.) (emphasizing a rhetorical question) what; what kind; why on earth
